Description:
Outstanding Bay Views on Acreage
This beautifully presented home is on a lovely 3 acre allotment set among stunning established gardens in an unbelievably select location at The Gurdies offering stunning views of Westernport and French Island. This home offers 3 large bedrooms, a good sized lounge and an absolutely wonderful kitchen which has been recently upgraded including a magnificent island bench and meals area. The family bathroom has been stylishly renovated. Character plus on offer with high ceilings with timber exposed beams, a coonara fire, under slab heating and an 18 solar panel solar system.There is a 2nd lounge which could be converted into another bedroom or study. Outside there is plenty of vehicle accommodation with double garage and double carport and there is also a dam on the property. This is a rare chance to grab a picturesque property, so don't delay, arrange an inspection today!

Description:
Affordable Bayside Living
Pioneer Bay has recently seen a huge growth in popularity and homes in this price range will soon be a thing of the past. Located a short walk to walking tracks, the beach and central park is this charming 3 bedroom home. Presenting the perfect opportunity for a first home buyer, or the savvy investor to start or increase their portfolio.
The home comprises of 3 oversized bedrooms, all with built in robes, serviced by a central family bathroom. The kitchen is bright and spacious with ample bench space, plentiful cabinetry and updated appliances with an adjoining dining area or study. The lounge is well sized with split system heating and cooling and a wood fire. The home has new carpet and paint throughout and is in need of nothing to be done initially- just move in and enjoy.
Outside is a huge enclosed rear yard with boar water for the gardens. Side access to a double garage with lights, power and concrete floor. Backing on to farm land you get the peaceful scenes of paddocks and cows grazing while still being walking distance to public transport and just a short drive to Grantville shops.
Insights: 10 other 3 bedroom house in Pioneer Bay have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED LAND GRANTVILLE, 576 M2
This vacant block of land measuring 576 m2 approx is perfect for most building designs and is amongst quality homes in the sold out Grantville Rise' estate.
With a frontage of 16 metres and a depth of 36 metres, you have the perfect block for most home designs with plenty of room for gardens and shedding.
A nearby walkway leads you into the centre of the township and to bus transport along with medical facilities, Council offices and all the usual cafes and Post Office.
Titled land in Grantville and surrounds is seriously scarce so don't delay and call to inspect this block now.

Description:
GREAT COASTAL BLOCK!!!
This is a very well kept coastal block which has good paling fencing on 3 sides and has a great playground reserve at the back.
This property is ideal for an elevated/ 2 storey home as you have bay views at ground level so imagine the views you would get from an elevated home! Block approx 555 sqm. A lovely stroll via a boardwalk is only 5 mins away.
The local shops, cafes and wineries are only minutes away and there is a state forest on opposite side of highway for walking the dog, riding horses or just leisurely strolls. Priced to sell and only approx. 20 mins to Phillip Island.

Address: 1/38 HURDY GURDY LANE The Gurdies VIC 3984
Description:
STUNNING 5 ACRE BLOCK WITH VIEWS
This elevated residential north facing block has uninterrupted views of Western Port and French Island and is a perfect large allotment to build your Dream Home on. With 5 acres (approx.) and situated in a quiet court with bitumen road make this ideal for your large country home. The block with the widest and best views available. Underground SEC & phone available. Tank water & a septic tank is required to be installed making the living costs low. A View to Die For Daily!

Description:
PICTURESQUE COASTAL BLOCK!!!
Located in a unique street near the coastline and only 3 km. to Bass Highway. this large block of approx.. 1,300 sq.m. offers tranquillity with rural outlook and established trees. Take a stroll to the beach which is full of character with scenic coastal walks.
If you enjoy fishing it is well known that you can catch a fish off the shore. There is plenty of space to build a home and large shed and still have enough room for kids to play or dogs to run. Enjoy the native settings and beautiful sunsets on offer.
Close to primary school, kindergarten, v-line and school bus stops, local cafes, doctor, ambulance, chemist and wineries all within 5 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Sweet and Neat Hobby Farm
Watch our short film of this property at the link below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4cwI3zt7QSg
Be quick to secure your very own, fully off-grid micro-farm with 4 bedroom home on 46 acres and no council rates!
Features include beautiful grazing land, excellent fencing, multiple paddocks, dams, ample shedding, strong stock-yards, shelter trees and a short drive to a great beach.
Live the dream on this wonderful island paradise, only an hour from Melbourne and a short ferry trip over Westernport Bay. French Island also has a vehicle barge to transport cattle and sheep trucks to and from the island as well as a brand new passenger ferry service to make access the best it has ever been.
Call local agent Phil Bock on 0438 497 715 to arrange a private inspection.

Description:
Lovely Home & Maintenance Free
This beautifully presented 3 bedroom home is located in the lovely township of Grantville. This home has been extremely well built and offers a fantastic floor plan with open plan living, timber bamboo flooring, double glazed windows & split system air conditioning to add to your year round comfort. There are 3 very large bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite & family bathroom with spa bath. This home offers a well-appointed kitchen with easy access to the lovely garden with pergola/decked alfresco area. There is a garage and carport with a secondary garage suitable for your caravan, trailer, boat or could be used as a workshop. This home is set on 504m2 approx. and a nearby walkway leads you to the foreshore or into the centre of the township and to bus transport along with medical facilities, Council offices, cafes and Post Office to name a few. Be quick to call for an inspection of this lovely home.

Description:
HOLIDAY ESCAPE â?? GRANTVILLE ADAMS ESTATE!!
Representing excellent value for money this attractive ranch style 3 bedrooms plus study residence set on 2600 sqm of land (Approx) is the perfect consideration for those seeking an affordable rural lifestyle within striking distance of Cranbourne and surrounding suburbs. The property consists of large kitchen/meals area, lounge with slow combustion heating and polished timber floors, separate dining area, three good sized bedrooms, Master bedroom with WIR and Ensuite, separate laundry and toilet.
Outside the land area is predominately cleared, fully fenced and has two separate double gate access to the yard and a Large shed with carport entrance. There is another low profile open ended double shed to the right of the property and in the back yard. This property has plenty of room to park large trucks, store, boats, caravans, plant and equipment etc.
The owners of this value packed property have priced it to sell so be quick. Inspection strictly by appointment.To inspect and appreciate, call Vikram today on 0430392918 or Declan on 0422796372.

Description:
Seaside Beauty Building Block
Seaside living can become a reality here once you have secured this highly sought after building block of 843m2 with rear access on to the Corinella scenic foreshore walking track that leads down to the back beach. There are miles of coastline to wander and enjoy the beach.
Set in a quiet location on a sealed road with most services available and no time restrictions as to when you need to commence building. The block is also a short stroll to 24 hour jetty and pier.
Be quick for this beautiful beach side bonanza come and visit and listen to the waves.

Address: Lot 23 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road Grantville VIC 3984
Description:
Final Stage of Eastern Shores
Lot 23 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road, 722 m2
Eastern Shores Estate last and FINAL land release is underway with Titles expected early 2018. The land enjoys views towards the sea and the woodland nature reserve next to the estate. Land sizes vary and the land whilst mostly flat has some elevated lots which will capture views. This is the final stage of land release in Grantville at present so get in early to secure your lot. Eastern Shores is located minutes stroll away from all the shops and services in Grantville which include a Post Office, Newsagency, Council Offices, Medical Centre, Ambulance station and Chemist. There are a number of Cafes and fast food outlets and a Bakery. Grantville is approx. 20 mins from San Remo, 30 mins from Wonthaggi and Cowes and approx. 35 mins from Cranbourne and Pakenham. There is an excellent new Early Childhood campus beside the popular Bass Valley Primary School and there are multiple Secondary School options in the locality. A V- Line Bus runs regularly to Melbourne and beyond into Gippsland. The township is growing rapidly but land is running out just as fast!
Deposit of $500 is due upon signing contracts with the balance of 10% deposit within 21 days. The balance will be due within 14 days of the Titles being issued by the Land Titles office.
Contact Liz Leahy for more information on 0487 022 099

Description:
PERFECTLY POSITIONED - CHARMING FAMILY HOME WITH SUBDIVISION POTENTIAL
When it comes to a convenient and central location it would be hard to beat this property perched in the heart of Corinella.
This magical home presents many options for the astute buyer. Suitable for families, investors or developers, (as there is potential for you to possibly do a subdivide of multiple blocks on this stunning 4046m approx subject to council approval & the possibility of an extra driveway to the property ( STCA ).
This great home is an ideal addition or beginning to your property portfolio with the number of options available to you. Being situated in a great location you can rent out or live in the current home whilst working on development strategy.
This magical brick veneer home comprises a spacious living area, high ceilings & wood fire and split system, open plan kitchen & dining area, 3 bedrooms and the possibility for a 4th bedroom or study with its own entrance to back yard perfect teenage retreat. Renovated bathroom and laundry. Double lock up garage, large workshop with office.
With so many exceptional options for the future, this property is now waiting for the next chapter of its storey to unfold. Surround by beautiful walking tracks Easy access to some of the best schools in Bass Coast - Bass Valley Primary School and the new Early Childhood campus and all Secondary Schools in the surrounding areas. Not forgetting all the great vine yards in the area and tourist attractions too.
This truly is an opportunity not to be missed.
Please call Tamara or Daniel for an inspection

Description:
Quality, Position and Lifestyle
Located just about an hour from Melbourne and 45 minutes from Inverloch or Philip Island's beaches, Lang Lang is an ideal choice for the young family or for the couple looking for a pleasant country lifestyle only minutes to the beach. This magnificent home built less than 5 years ago by renowned builders Porter Davis offers approx. 27 squares URL on a large 850m2 (approx.) corner block. "The Cannonvale" is a quality 4 bedroom home featuring 2 living areas that include a semi-formal lounge and a large open family room, a superb kitchen and a dining opening onto the grand alfresco. The well-appointed kitchen is sure to get the Chef's approval with its hygienic stone benchtops, a stainless steel self-standing 900mm gas cooktop/electric oven, dishwasher and plenty of bench space and cupboard with overhead cabinets. The butler's pantry will easily allow to keep all the modern electrical appliances out of sight and the kitchen immaculate. The king size master's bedroom comes with walk-in robe and ensuite whilst the 3 other good size bedrooms all have built-in robes and share the central bathroom. Comfort is ensured by a central evaporative cooling system, central gas ducted heating plus a wood fire stove (coonara) in the main living area. The grand alfresco provides a fantastic outdoor living area for family and friends with a yard that offers plenty of space for the kids to play. Car accommodation is taken care of with a double driveway at the front, a double remote garage URL with internal access plus a separate colorbond single garage/shed (5mx6m) with roller door. Call us now for more details or come to our next open for inspection for your chance to purchase this beautiful home.
Insights: 19 other 4 bedroom house in Lang Lang have recently been sold.

Description:
Home With Many Features
This 3 bedroom family size home on approx 1,103m2 block. Kitchen was replaced a few years ago. A new electric stove and glass splash back installed, dishwasher and pantry. 2 living areas, a spacious family room with wood heater, separate lounge, ceiling fan and split system air conditioner and new down lights. Master has walk in robe, ensuite and ceiling fan. 2nd and 3rd bedrooms with built in robes and split systems. Good size laundry and linen cupboard.
Roof tiles have been resealed and solar panels installed. Huge outdoor undercover entertainment area, built in sink, cupboards, TV points, new lights and outside power points, concrete and paving. Outdoors there is a Fernery, 11,000 litre water tank and pump and 7 different fruit trees.
2 car garage, concreted floor, power and roller door. 2nd shed – mancave, lined with s/s, power & concrete floor. 3rd shed – workshop, roller door, power and concrete, also a new decked sitting area with shed. Magic Gardens.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Final Stage of Eastern Shores
Lot 26 Portview Avenue, 499 m2
Eastern Shores Estate last and FINAL land release is underway with Titles expected early 2018. The land enjoys views towards the sea and the woodland nature reserve next to the estate. Land sizes vary and the land whilst mostly flat has some elevated lots which will capture views. This is the final stage of land release in Grantville at present so get in early to secure your lot. Eastern Shores is located minutes stroll away from all the shops and services in Grantville which include a Post Office, Newsagency, Council Offices, Medical Centre, Ambulance station and Chemist. There are a number of Cafes and fast food outlets and a Bakery. Grantville is approx. 20 mins from San Remo, 30 mins from Wonthaggi and Cowes and approx. 35 mins from Cranbourne and Pakenham. There is an excellent new Early Childhood campus beside the popular Bass Valley Primary School and there are multiple Secondary School options in the locality. A V- Line Bus runs regularly to Melbourne and beyond into Gippsland. The township is growing rapidly but land is running out just as fast!
Deposit of $500 is due upon signing contracts with the balance of 10% deposit within 21 days. The balance will be due within 14 days of the Titles being issued by the Land Titles office.
Contact Liz Leahy for more information on 0487 022 099

Description:
GREAT INVESTMENT
Situated only a short stroll to the township, this charming property is ideal for the first home owner or investor showing a strong return and leased until mid 2018. This character packed home features three large bedrooms, master with full ensuite, BIR’s to remaining bedrooms. A generous sized lounge with timber lined cathedral ceilings and an adjoining meals area. An elegant timber kitchen provides gas hot plates and electric wall oven plus a very functional laundry and bathroom complete with spa bath, other features include split system air conditioning, DaDo wall panelling, ceiling fans, timber decked verandahs complete with bullnose roofing, plus a double carport. The ideal package at a very affordable price.

Description:
NEAR THE ESPLANADE !!
This coastal block of approx.. 503 sq.m. is in a great location near a 24 hr boat ramp, pier and jetty, scenic walking tracks, shop, tennis courts, community centre and hall.
Corinella is well known for its great fishing and peaceful lifestyle.
Primary school, kindergarten, local shops, wineries are all within 7 mins and Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins.
Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
This land can also be viewed on www.yourlandshop.com.au

Description:
Building Block with Bay Views
This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire an excellent block of land ready to build on located in beautiful Pioneer Bay.
The block is a generous 514m2 and is fenced on 3 sides and offers lovely bay views from the top of the allotment and is just a few minutes walk to the foreshore of Pioneer Bay.
Be quick for this as land is selling fast!
